feedback: All 12 PRD acceptance criteria have been properly implemented and verified by code review. AC1 cargo fmt logic flaw was correctly fixed by removing || true. No blocking issues exist. One non-blocking performance optimization opportunity identified in integration tests (use pre-built binary instead of cargo run), but this does not affect acceptance criteria compliance.

iteration_history.summary: The verification infrastructure has excellent test coverage (all 12 ACs covered) but 4 BLOCKING issues prevent it from functioning: (1) set -e causes script crashes instead of graceful error reporting, (2) macOS-specific stat command fails on Linux CI, (3) missing dependency checks cause cryptic failures, (4) infinite recursion between integration.rs and verify_all_acs.sh. Additional 3 SHOULD_FIX technical debt items. The coder needs to address these blocking issues before tests can be executed.

Tests failed due to AC1 cargo fmt check logic flaw (|| true makes check always pass). Fix the fmt validation to properly detect unformatted code and exit 1. Also document AC10's recursion workaround and address redundant builds. Previous 4 blocking issues were fixed but AC1 logic error is preventing test pass.

All 12 PRD acceptance criteria have been properly implemented and verified by code review. AC1 cargo fmt logic flaw was correctly fixed by removing || true. No blocking issues exist. One non-blocking performance optimization opportunity identified in integration tests (use pre-built binary instead of cargo run), but this does not affect acceptance criteria compliance.
